snippet: It is difficult to explain why many are drawn to the city, and what many people imagine to be the standard reasons rarely ring true.
abstract: Ginia Bellafante Big City column expresses wonder at what keeps so many people living in New York City with all of its expense, noise and inconveniences; suggests that those who are used to New York might not find sufficient stimulation outside the city.
lead_paragraph: It is difficult to explain why many are drawn to the city, and what many people imagine to be the standard reasons rarely ring true.

headline.seo: Dissecting the Allure of New York City
headline.main: Exit Ramps Lead Right Back Here
headline.print_headline: Exit Ramps Lead Right Back Here
